card_landmark_utility:
Obtain the Audio Avatar NFT right of first refusal
For example: in the future Audio Avatar NFT series, you will become a VIP, get priority in purchasing, get the advantage of early bird collection, and create an exclusive Digital Avatar.
label_landmark_introduction: The lost sound is re-encoded, generated, and restored at the source of the tree of life. A clear bagel carries the power of the original sound and falls off after the treetop matures. Because the weight of the sound is very light, a strong wind blows away the falling bagel: you have obtained the bagel, you have digital sound components, and your words are clear and thorough, making it inevitable for people remember and collect them.
